This is Nostoc. It's a cyanobacteria that can be found on the ground as well as in water.

Had a very sad call from a friend this morning. Their dog had to be put to sleep after swimming yesterday at Bewl Water in Kent. The reservoir has blue/green algae and is highly toxic to dogs. 
If you do walk your dogs there, please do not allow them to swim or drink from it!
